name: ecosystem_health_check
description: Token health check and risk analysis for any token on Base chain. Analyzes on-chain DEX data: liquidity depth, 24h trading volume, buy/sell ratio, price action, pair age â€” returns a health score (0-100) with risk flags. Use cases: token due diligence, is this token safe, DeFi risk assessment, liquidity check, token analysis, token health. Powered by DEXScreener. Returns structured JSON for agents and a human-readable summary for Butler users.
